sn35.15:1.1: “Monks, I went in search of the seer’s gratification,
sn35.15:1.3: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the seer’s gratification.
sn35.15:1.4: I went in search of the seer’s drawback,
sn35.15:1.6: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the seer’s drawback.
sn35.15:1.7: I went in search of escape from the seer,
sn35.15:1.9: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the seer.
sn35.15:1.10: I went in search of the hearer's …
sn35.15:1.23: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the thinker’s gratification.
sn35.15:1.24: I went in search of the thinker’s drawback,
sn35.15:1.26: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the thinker’s drawback.
sn35.15:1.27: I went in search of escape from the thinker,
sn35.15:1.29: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the thinker.
sn35.15:2.1: As long as I didn’t truly understand these six interior sense fields’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening …
sn35.15:2.2: But when I did truly understand …
sn35.15:2.3: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn35.15:2.4: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there’ll be no more future lives.’”
